concept.title: Overview
concept.shortdesc: The Couchbase .NET SDK 2.0 is the official driver for Couchbase Server. Written entirely in the C# programming language, it targets .NET Framework 4.5 and greater and Couchbase Server 2.5 and greater

conbody.p: This is the documentation for the SDK and it groups features into sections. Within each feature section, you will find concepts or tasks references to additional information or topics, and other topics which are identified as relating to the feature in discussion.
Until the SDK reaches General Availability, expect the documentation to change with respect to structure and content.
Being a work in progress, feedback is greatly appreciated. Please send your comments, requests, suggestions to jeffry.morris@couchbase.com.
